channel.title: Getting started
channel.description: ok....i know how to use hamachi....and i can get onto 1 server with that.....but it keeps going down.....then i found this 24\7 server and i wanted to join it.....but it doesnt use hamchi......how can i get on that server?

item.title: Getting started
item.dc:creator: @Krew_Kid Krew Kid
item.description:
@Krew_Kid wrote:

if it doesn’t use hamachi then just type it’s ip address in the ip section of the client your using.

ex. “kr3wscape.no-ip.info”

Read full topic
